card.name: Alabaster Witch
card.text: Flying When Alabaster Witch enters the battlefield, you gain X life, where X is the number of creatures in your squad. (Your sentai consists of up to one creature of each color.)

card.name: Bureaucrat
card.text: Flash Defender When Bureaucrat enters the battlefield, return target spell to its owner’s hand.

card.name: Cooks
card.text: Defender When Cooks enters or leaves the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Cop
card.text: Defender When Cop enters the battlefield, exile target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls until Cop leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Garden Witch
card.text: When Garden Witch enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token.

card.name: Inconvenient Bystander
card.text: Defender W, T: Tap target creature.

card.name: Networking Witch
card.text: When Networking Witch enters the battlefield, search your library for a Wizard card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

card.name: Obvious Tessa Knockoff
card.text: Flying, vigilance, lifelink 4W, T: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Hush Obvious Tessa Knockoff.

card.name: The Prime Minister
card.text: Defender Other creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Protector of the Weak
card.text: Flash When Protector of the Weak enters the battlefield, you may return another target creature you control to its owner’s hand.

card.name: Safe Zone
card.text: Flash When Safe Zone enters the battlefield, exile any number of target creatures you control until Safe Zone leaves the battlefield. Sacrifice Safe Zone: You gain 3 life.

card.name: Taki Ryoka Househusband
card.text: Defender Whenever Taki Ryoka, Househusband or another creature with defender enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Unlikely Hero
card.text: Flash Defender When Unlikely Hero enters the battlefield, target creature gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Absolute Terror Field
card.text: Flash Enchant creature or Vehicle When Absolute Terror Field enters the battlefield, enchanted permanent gains hexproof until end of turn. Enchanted permanent gets +1/+3.

card.name: Ancient Serpent Sage
card.text: When Ancient Serpent Sage enters the battlefield, draw X cards, where X is the number of creatures in your squad. (Your squad consists of up to one creature of each color.)

card.name: Cerulean Witch
card.text: Flying When Cerulean Witch enters the battlefield, scry X, where X is the number of creatures in your squad. (Your squad consists of up to one creature of each color.)

card.name: Cyberknight Frame
card.text: Hexproof Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Mecha Design Program
card.text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put any number of Pilot, Artificer, Vehicle, and/or Aura cards from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Mecha Mimic
card.text: You may have Mecha Mimic enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature or Vehicle on the battlefield, except it’s a 7/7 Vehicle artifact with crew 2. Crew 2

card.name: Moon Rising Hero of Justice!
card.text: When Moon Rising, Hero of Justice! enters the battlefield, create Lunar Rabbit, a legendary 3/3 blue Vehicle artifact token with flying and crew 2.

card.name: Protect the Team
card.text: If you have a full squad, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost. (Your squad consists of up to one creature of each color.) Counter target spell unless its controller pays 1 for each creature in your squad.

card.name: Scientists
card.text: Defender When Scientists enters or leaves the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Send Away
card.text: Put target artifact or creature into its owner’s library X cards from the top, where X is the number of creatures in your squad. (Your squad consists of up to one creature of each color.)

card.name: Wandworker
card.text: Ward X, where X is the number of creatures in your squad (Your squad consists of up to one creature of each color.)

card.name: Ami Ryoka Executive
card.text: Defender Whenever Ami Ryoka, Executive or another creature with defender enters the battlefield under your control, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Gaze Into Nightmare
card.text: Draw three cards. You lose X life, where X is 5 minus the number of creatures in your squad. (Your squad consists of up to one creature of each color.)

card.name: Man-Eating Kaiju
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay 2 or sacrifice a creature. Menace

card.name: Quisling
card.text: Defender When Quisling enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Team Attack
card.text: This spell costs 1 less to cast for each creature in your squad. (Your squad consists of up to one creature of each color.) Exile target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Tenebrous Witch
card.text: Flying When Tenebrous Witch enters the battlefield, each opponent loses X life, where X is the number of creatures in your squad. (Your squad consists of up to one creature of each color.)

card.name: Thieves
card.text: Defender When Thieves enters or leaves the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Berserker Mode
card.text: Enchant creature or Vehicle Enchanted permanent gets +2/+0 and has first strike and trample. At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice Berserker Mode unless enchanted permanent attacked this turn.

card.name: Cheering Fan
card.text: Flash Defender When Cheering Fan enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Eccentric Tinkerer
card.text: When Eccentric Tinkerer enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each Vehicle you control.

card.name: Gunman
card.text: Defender, reach When Gunman enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Laserknuckle
card.text: Double strike Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Lynch Mob
card.text: Defender When Lynch Mob enters the battlefield, it fights up to one target creature.

card.name: Monster Victim
card.text: Defender Creatures your opponents control attack you each combat if able. Monster Victim blocks each combat if able.

card.name: Musicians
card.text: Defender When Musicians enters or leaves the battlefield, create a tapped 1/1 white Human creature token.

card.name: Reckless Pilot
card.text: Whenever Reckless Pilot crews a Vehicle, you may have that Vehicle gain flying, double strike, and trample until end of turn. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Sun Rising Hero of Justice!
card.text: When Sun Rising, Hero of Justice! enters the battlefield, create Solar Lion, a legendary 4/4 red Vehicle artifact token with haste and crew 2.

card.name: Taxi Driver
card.text: Defender Whenever Taxi Driver crews a Vehicle, that Vehicle gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Torches and Pitchforks
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Creatures you control with defender can attack this turn as though they didn’t have defender.

card.name: Explorers
card.text: Defender When Explorers enters or leaves the battlefield, search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Super Robot Galaxy Rise
card.text: Signature — Sun Rising, Hero of Justice! and Moon Rising, Hero of Justice! (You may put your signature into your hand from outside the game when you control the named creatures.) Flying, hexproof, haste Sacrifice a Vehicle: Put two +1/+1 counters on Super Robot Galaxy Rise. Crew 4

card.name: Suzuna Ryoka Kid Hero
card.text: Signature — Ami Ryoka, Executive and Taki Ryoka, Househusband (You may put your signature into your hand from outside the game when you control the named creatures.) If a creature with defender you own would die, instead exile it. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Dragonfriend
card.text: Defender When Dragonfriend enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

card.name: Little Fire Witch
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant, sorcery, or Wizard spell, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.

card.name: Monster Attack
card.text: For each creature you control, you may create a 4/4 red and black Nightmare Beast creature token. If you do, that token fights that creature.

card.name: Rainbow Summons
card.text: Signature — Cerulean Witch, Alabaster Witch, and Tenebrous Witch (You may put your signature into your hand from outside the game when you control the named creatures.) Create two 4/4 Spirit creature tokens that are all colors.

card.name: AI-Driven Mech
card.text: As long as AI-Driven Mech is enchanted, it’s an artifact creature. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Mecha Sword
card.text: Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample. Whenever a Vehicle you control becomes an artifact creature, you may attach Mecha Sword to it. Equip 3
